title: A China Subway Flood Survivor's Harrowing Experience: 'I May Not Be Able to Get Out'
content:
1. A China Subway Flood Survivor's Harrowing Experience: 'I May Not Be Able to Get Out'  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Xi Jinping should take the Zhengzhou floods as a warning from China’s history  The Guardian
  3. Tragedy shows Hong Kong needs to be alert in world of worsening weather  South China Morning Post
  4. Severe Flooding in China Has Commuters Deep in Water on Subway  Inside Edition

localize.title: 中国の地下鉄水害の生存者の悲惨な体験「出られないかもしれない
